data.title: ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
data.meta_description: Get detailed financial reports of Orangescape Technologies Private Limited including EBITDA, Assets, Liabilities & more on Tofler. Sign up for detailed balance sheet of Orangescape Technologies Private Limited
data.text:
The financial reports of ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED include financial history (previous 5 Years), ratio analysis, management details such as directors & key persons of the company, shareholding & group structure details, mortgages & charges on ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED.

The operating revenue of ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED is in the range of INR 1 cr - 100 cr for the financial year ending on 31 March, 2023.

The EBITDA of ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED has increased by 9.14 % over the previous year. At the same time, it's book networth has decreased by -183.93 % for the financial year ending 31 March, 2023.

The price of financial report of ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED prepared by Tofler is INR 799. It is an easy-to-read PDF report on the company that includes five year financial information, ratio analysis, management, group structure, shareholding pattern and more.

Subscribe to the Tofler Company360 program for complete access to Tofler's database.

Follow 5 easy steps to download the balance sheet of ORANGESCAPE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED:

1) Search for the company you require in the Tofler search bar

2) Select the financial reports in the Company Financials Section and add them to the cart

3) Confirm your email address on which you want reports to be delivered

4) Confirm & Checkout to Pay

5) Reports will be sent to your registered email address
